Step 2) Add CSS: To center a table, set left and right margin to auto : Example .center { margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; } Note that a table cannot be centered if the width is set to 100% (full-width). Tip: Go to our CSS Tables Tutorial to learn more about how to style tables. ★ +1
